task_description: Publish AISMR compilation to TikTok with optimized caption and hashtags
quality_criteria: Caption matches AISMR brand voice (surreal, mesmerizing)
Hashtags are relevant and high-intent for ASMR/surreal content
Upload is verified successful before completion
Post URL is stored and shared with stakeholders
Completion signal sent via handoff_to_agent with toAgent='complete'
Social copy aligns with knowledge_get insights on platform voice and hashtag strategy.
workflow_steps: Call knowledge_get with persona "quinn" and project "aismr" to refresh social publishing guidelines before crafting copy or scheduling posts.
Load Alex's final video URL via memory_search
Review project branding and voice guidelines
Craft TikTok caption in AISMR style
Upload video to TikTok via upload-post adapter
Verify upload success and capture post URL
Store caption, hashtags, and URL with memory_store
success_definition: Video successfully published to TikTok with optimized caption and hashtags, URL stored, and run marked complete
